tiles.title: Unsmoothed CUÂ´s Utilization by Window Start

queries.text:
_workspaceQuery
| count

Items
| join kind=inner _workspaceQuery on $right.id == $left.workspaceId
| count

Items
| join kind=inner _workspaceQuery on $left.workspaceId == $right.id
| where itemType in (_itemType)
| summarize ItemsCount=count() by itemType

WorkspacesUsers
| join kind=inner _workspaceQuery on $left.workspaceId == $right.id
| summarize Users=count_distinct(graphId) by principalType,Access=groupUserAccessRight

ItemsUsers
| join kind=inner _workspaceQuery on $left.workspaceId == $right.id
| summarize Users=count_distinct(graphId) by Type = itemType, Access=userAccessRight

_workspaceQuery
| summarize Workspaces=count() by Type=type,["Is On Capacity"]=isOnDedicatedCapacity
| order by Type, ['Is On Capacity'] desc

let _itemCount = Items | where itemType in (_itemType) | summarize Items=count() by workspaceId;
_workspaceQuery
| lookup Capacities on $left.capacityId == $right.CapacityId
| lookup _itemCount on $left.id == $right.workspaceId
| project ["Workspace Name"]=name, Description=description, ["Capacity Name"] = CapacityName, Items
| top 1000 by Items

_capacityBase
| count

let workspaces_count = Workspaces | summarize Workspaces=count() by capacityId;
_capacitySummary
| project TimepointConsumption= capacityUnitSecond/timepointCapacityUnits, capacityId, CapacityName, Sku, Region, State
| summarize ['Capacity Usage %'] = round(avg(TimepointConsumption)*100,2) by capacityId,CapacityName, Sku, Region, State
| extend  ['Capacity Usage %'] = strcat(tostring(iff(isnan(['Capacity Usage %']),0.0,['Capacity Usage %'])),"%")
| lookup workspaces_count on $left.capacityId ==  $right.capacityId
| project ['Capacity Name']=CapacityName, ['Capacity Id']=capacityId, Sku, Region, State, Workspaces, ['Capacity Usage %']
| order by Workspaces desc

_capacityBase
| summarize Capacities=count() by Sku

let workspaces_count = Workspaces | summarize Workspaces=count() by capacityId;
_capacityBase
| lookup workspaces_count on $left.CapacityId ==  $right.capacityId
| summarize Workspaces=sum(Workspaces) by Sku

let workspaces_count = Workspaces | where type in (_type) and state in (_state) | summarize Workspaces=count() by capacityId;
_capacityBase
| lookup workspaces_count on $left.CapacityId ==  $right.capacityId
| summarize Workspaces=sum(Workspaces)

_capacityBase
| lookup Workspaces on $left.CapacityId == $right.capacityId
| project CapacityName, WorkspaceName=name, WorkspaceId = id
| take 1000

let _workspaces = _workspaceQuery | project id;
ItemsViews(_endTime - _startTime)
| where WorkspaceId in (_workspaces)
| project IPLocation=geo_info_from_ip_address(tostring(details.ClientIP)), ItemType
| project latitude=toreal(IPLocation.latitude), longitude=toreal(IPLocation.longitude), ItemType
| summarize Events=count() by latitude,longitude,ItemType
| where isnotempty( latitude) or isnotempty(longitude)

let workspaces_count = Workspaces | summarize Workspaces=count() by capacityId;
_capacityBase
| lookup workspaces_count on $left.CapacityId ==  $right.capacityId
| project CapacityName,CapacityId, Workspaces
| order by Workspaces desc

_capacityOperations
| summarize CU=sum(capacityUnitMs)/1000 by ['Workspace Name']=workspaceName, ['Capacity Name']=CapacityName
| top 10 by CU

_capacityOperations
| summarize CapacityUnitsSeconds=sum(capacityUnitMs)/1000 by operationName

let _timespan = case(
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(730d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(365d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(60d), timespan(6h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(14d), timespan(1h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(1d), timespan(30m),
    timespan(30s)
);
_capacitySummary
| project ['Capacity Name']=CapacityName, ['Capacity Useage %'] = round((capacityUnitSecond/timepointCapacityUnits)*100, 2), ['Window Time']=windowStartTime, capacityId
| make-series ['Capacity Useage %']=avg(['Capacity Useage %']) on ['Window Time'] from _startTime to _endTime step _timespan by ['Capacity Name'], capacityId

_queriesBase
| extend Status = case(
    Success == "Y", "Success",
    Success == "N", "Failed",
    "In Progress"
)
| summarize Jobs=count() by Status
| order by Jobs

_gatewayNodesBase
| join GatewayNodeInfo on $left.memberId == $right.nodeId
| join GatewaysHeartbeat on $left.memberId == $right.GatewayId
| summarize arg_max(ServerTimestampUTC, *) by GatewayId
| project
    Responding=
    case(
    ServerTimestampUTC < ago(10s),
    false,
    Responding
),
    ['Gateway Name'] = gatewayName, ['Gateway Id']=gatewayId,
    ['Node Name']=memberName, ['Node Id']=memberId,
    ['Gateway Version']=version1,
    ['Last Heartbeat Time']=ServerTimestampUTC,
    ['Node Cores']=cores,
    ['Node Memory']=round(memoryGb,0),
    ['OS Name']=osName,
    ['OS Version']=osVersion

_gatewayNodesBase
| summarize ['Nodes']=count()

_queriesBase
| count

_queriesBase
| summarize count_distinct(RequestId)

_queriesBase
| summarize min(QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC), max(QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC), Progress=countif(isempty(Success)),count(), Successes=countif(Success == "Y") by RequestId
| project ['Start Time']=min_QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC,
['End Time']=iff(Progress > 0, datetime(null), max_QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC),
['Duration']=totimespan(max_QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC - min_QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC),
Status = case(
    Progress > 0, "In Progress",
    Successes==count_, "Success",
    "Failed"
)
| order by ['Start Time']

_tenantSettingBase
| project TenantSettingGroup,Title, Enabled, CanSpecifySecurityGroups,EnabledSecurityGroups
| order by TenantSettingGroup asc

_tenantSettingBase
| summarize Settings=count() by Enabled

WorkspaceDelegatedSettings
| count

CapacityDelegatedSettings
| summarize count() by CapacityId
| lookup Capacities on CapacityId
| project ['Settings Changed']=count_, ['Capacity Name']=CapacityName
| order by ['Settings Changed']

DomainDelegatedSettings
| count

_tenantSettingBase
| count

TenantSettingsHistory
| where scanTime between (datetime_add('second',-1,_date) .. datetime_add('second',+1,_date))
| where Enabled in (_tenantSettingEnabled)

TenantSettingsHistory
| where scanTime between (datetime_add('second',-1,_date) .. datetime_add('second',+1,_date))
| where Enabled in (_tenantSettingEnabled)
| count

TenantSettingsHistory
| where scanTime between (datetime_add('second',-1,_date) .. datetime_add('second',+1,_date))
| where Enabled in (_tenantSettingEnabled)
| summarize Settings=count() by Enabled

_capacityBase
| project CapacityName,CapacityId, Capacity=1

let workspaces_count = Workspaces | where type in (_type) and state in (_state) | summarize Workspaces=count() by capacityId;
_capacityBase
| lookup workspaces_count on $left.CapacityId ==  $right.capacityId
| summarize Workspaces=sum(Workspaces)

_capacitySummary
| project TimepointConsumption= capacityUnitSecond/timepointCapacityUnits
| summarize ['Capacity Usage %'] = round(avg(TimepointConsumption)*100,2)
| project strcat(tostring(iff(isnan(['Capacity Usage %']),0.0,['Capacity Usage %'])),"%")

Capacities
| where CapacityId in (_capacities)
| where Sku in (_capacityType)

let _wsId = Items | where itemType in (_itemType) | summarize by workspaceId;
Workspaces
| where id in (_wsId)
| where isOnDedicatedCapacity in (_isOnCapacity)
    and type in (_type)
    and name contains _workspaceName
    and state in (_state)
    and case(
        isnotempty(_workspaceName) and isnotempty(_workspaceNameExact), id in (_workspaceNameExact),
        true
    )
| where iff(
    false in (_isOnCapacity),
    isempty(capacityId) or capacityId in (_capacities),
    capacityId in (_capacities)
    )

CapacitySummary
| where windowStartTime between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where capacityId in (_capacities)
| lookup Capacities on $left.capacityId == $right.CapacityId

CapacityOperations
| where windowStartTime  between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where capacityId in (_capacities)
| lookup Capacities on $left.capacityId == $right.CapacityId

Gateways
| where gatewayId in (_gateways)

GatewayMembers
| where memberId in (_gatewayNodes)
| lookup Gateways on $left.gatewayId == $right.gatewayId

let _queryExecutionReport = QueryExecutionReport | where QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC > _startTime and GatewayObjectId in (_gatewayNodes) | project RequestId,QueryTrackingId,QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC,QueryExecutionDuration_ms_,Success,ErrorMessage,QueryType, GatewayObjectId;
QueryStartReport
| where QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC between (_startTime .. _endTime) and GatewayObjectId in (_gatewayNodes)
| project GatewayObjectId,QueryTrackingId,OperationType,ServiceName,CurrentActivityId,ItemId,RootActivityId,WorkspaceId,QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC,RequestId
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy=shuffle hint.shufflekey=RequestId hint.num_partitions=6 _queryExecutionReport on QueryTrackingId and GatewayObjectId and RequestId
| lookup GatewayMembers on $left.GatewayObjectId == $right.memberId
| lookup Gateways on $left.gatewayId == $right.gatewayId
| project NodeId=GatewayObjectId, RequestId, QueryTrackingId, QueryExecutionStartTimeUTC, QueryExecutionEndTimeUTC, QueryExecutionDuration_ms_, OperationType, ServiceName, CurrentActivityId, ItemId, QueryType, RootActivityId, WorkspaceId,Success, ErrorMessage, memberName,gatewayName, gatewayId

TenantSettings
| where Enabled in (_tenantSettingEnabled)

Workspaces
| where name contains _workspaceName
| project id,name
| take 1000

Capacities
| summarize by Sku
| where Sku != "PP3"

Capacities
| where Sku in (_capacityType)
| project CapacityId,CapacityName

Gateways
| project gatewayName, gatewayId

_gatewayBase
| join hint.strategy=broadcast GatewayMembers on gatewayId
| project memberId, memberName

TenantSettingsHistory
| summarize by scanTime
| order by scanTime desc

Items
| summarize by itemType
